document.full_text: a 36-hour standoff between police and a gun-wielding man barricaded in an apartment ended on saturday with the man shot dead by police and his 7-year-old daughter removed unharmed.
document.title: new hampshire standoff ends with man shot dead
lines_and_colors: a 36-hour standoff between police and a gun-wielding man barricaded in an apartment ended on saturday with the man shot dead by police and his 7-year-old daughter removed unharmed.
